headline: Builders FirstSource Charity Event Raises $1.6 Million for Blood Cancer United
summary: IRVING, Texas, October 08, 2025--Builders FirstSource (NYSE: BLDR) today announced that its 2025 charity event held Sept. 24-25 raised approximately $1.6 million for Blood Cancer United (formerly known as The Leukemia & Lymphoma Society). This marks the 19th year of the Builders FirstSource partnership with Blood Cancer United, which has helped raise a total of more than $15 million for critical research, patient support, and advocacy programs dedicated to advancing treatments and cures for bloo

This marks the 19th year of the Builders FirstSource partnership with Blood Cancer United, which has helped raise a total of more than $15 million for critical research, patient support, and advocacy programs dedicated to advancing treatments and cures for bloo
